     * {@link IInputMethodManagerGlobalInvoker#startInputOrWindowGainedFocusAsync}.

variables.name: mSequenceNum
variables.comment:
* Sequence number to track startInput requests to
         * {@link IInputMethodManagerGlobalInvoker#startInputOrWindowGainedFocusAsync}
